thread.title: Great hotel - let down by kitchen(again)
thread.title_full: Great hotel - let down by kitchen(again) - Review of Apex City of London Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Naz L
title: Great hotel - let down by kitchen(again)
text: Second time we've stayed at this hotel.Cant be faulted for location, standard of accomodation , friendliness & helpfulness of staff, great value for money.However, its the second occasion upon which we've had issues with the food- this time breakfast eggs overcooked then remedied with inedible cold replacements. Come on Apex - you could do so much better with a little more attention to these finer details.
